subject: RE: [junit] How to test the void methods?
msgSnippet: Your void method should have some effect on the object that is detectable. Use other (accessors maybe) methods to detect these effects and verify they are
messageBody:
Your void method should have some effect on the object that is detectable.
Use other (accessors maybe) methods to detect these effects and verify they
are correct.
joe
